Dialogue.Page: How strange... I do not recognize you. It is rare for an outsider to enter these halls.
What would you ask of me?

DialogueOption.Text: Can you help us open the Great Door?
Do you know anything about the Fifth Shard?
Do you know where the other clans are?
Thanks for helping us open the Great Door.
Do you know anything about the Fifth Shard?
Do you know where the other clans are?
Thanks for helping us open the Great Door.

Dialogue.Page: I would normally reply with no. I do not wish to aid the other clans in gaining power from whatever is behind the Great Door.
But you have demonstrated profound logic for an outsider. Most Ghirds are unable to figure the code out themselves.
I speak for the rest of my clan when I say that the Followers of Logic will contribute their shard to this mission.
You have done well to reach this place. It is only fair that you receive a reward.
My clan knows only a piece of the information you require. The old manuscripts detailing the myth of the shard have been scattered between the clans.
The manuscripts I have tell me this: "...place a light upon the stone..."
The rest of it I do not know. I hope this information helps you.
The last time our clan heard of the others, there was one Ghird clan on the southern hemisphere and two Nomai clans on the northern hemisphere.
It is my pleasure. When the time comes, I will be with you to open the Great Door.
